answerText: index of refraction[10] This effect is the change in the index of refraction due to the imposition of an electric field. It is named after a Scottish physicist.

question: Question: Snell's law uses them to relate the angles of incidence and refraction. FTPE: [10] Name this measure indicating the reduction of the speed of light in a given medium.
